thread.title: Boy, 7, steals show at Republican senator's town hall event
thread.title_full: Boy, 7, steals show at Republican senator's town hall event - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Boy, 7, steals show at Republican senator's town hall event
text:
A seven-year-old called Toby Smith had a question to ask Republican Senator Tom Cotton about President Trump's planned wall - and he stole the show.
During a heated town hall meeting, the young boy asked Senator Cotton why Donald Trump planned to cut public broadcasting services to build a border wall with Mexico.
Read more The town halls trying to tackle Trump's agenda What do Mexicans say about Donald Trump's wall announcement?
